name: The Ruins (LucidDH)
description:
A desolate wasteland... a shell of what the Earth once was. I wonder... what will it take for a nice view?

Blue jump orbs replenish your dash and double jump.

CONTROLS:

Arrows - to move and aim dash (up and down for dash too)

C - jump or double jump if you're in the air

X - dash in the direction you're aiming (for example, if you're holding right and up, you'll dash diagonally that way)

Music from zapsplat.

I was bored so I made this in 7 days.
